title: Why was my GCash account deactivated
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I want to update my address or work information in GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45260364962329-I-want-to-update-my-address-or-work-information-in-GCash)

- [My GCash account is on hold. How can I access my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18374080547609-My-GCash-account-is-on-hold-How-can-I-access-my-account)
- [I was Fully Verified, why was my GCash account downgraded to a basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31782046693529-I-was-Fully-Verified-why-was-my-GCash-account-downgraded-to-a-basic-account)
- [GScore](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566894-GScore)

- [Why was my GCash account deactivated?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19643426242201-Why-was-my-GCash-account-deactivated)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657754-Manage-Your-Account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If you received an email on Account Deactivation and cannot access your GCash account anymore, it means your GCash Basic account was deactivated/closed.

A GCash account **will be deactivated if it is not fully verified within 12 months** from the time the account was opened. This is in line with Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP) rules and regulations **.** You may [click here](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38803672609305-What-happens-if-I-don-t-fully-verify-my-GCash-account) to read more about this policy.

If you want to use GCash again, you can [create a new GCash account.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005866623-Create-a-GCash-account)

### **If your account has money:**

GCash Basic accounts that are unverified and have funds will be suspended and will be collected an **Account Maintenance Fee of PHP 15 monthly**.  This fee will continue to be charged until the wallet balance reaches 0.

If you want to withdraw the remaining funds on your GCash Basic account,  you may follow these [steps.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38827343196185-How-do-I-claim-my-money-from-a-suspended-GCash-Basic-account)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How do I delete or close my GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005315866)
- [I want to transact offline with GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38911689985049)
- [My GCash account is on hold. How can I access my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18374080547609)
- [How do I create a new GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005866623)
- [How do I claim my money from a suspended GCash Basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38827343196185)
